In 2016, the Company received a$167 millioncash dividend distribution from Wilsonart which exceeded the Company’s equity investment balance and resulted in a$54 millionpre-tax gain, partially offset by $30 million of pre-tax losses related to the disposals of businesses and the disposal of a partnership investment. Refer to Note 4. Other Income (Expense) in Item 8. Financial Statements and Supplementary Data for further information on the Wilsonart equity investment.
